data.text: Tsono anthu atatuwa analeka kumuyankha Yobu, chifukwa chakuti iyeyo ankadziona kuti ndi wolungama.
Koma Elihu, mwana wa Barakeli, wa fuko la Buzi, wa banja la Ramu, anapsera mtima kwambiri Yobu chifukwa choti Yobuyo anakana kuvomera kuti anachimwa ndi kuti Mulungu anakhoza pomulanga.
Anapseranso mtima abwenzi ake atatu aja chifukwa sanapeze njira yomutsutsira Yobu, ngakhale iwo anamupeza kuti anali wolakwa.
Tsono Elihu anadikira kuti ayankhule ndi Yobu chifukwa choti abwenziwo anali akuluakulu kupambana iyeyo.
Koma Elihu ataona kuti anthu atatuwo analibe mawu oti ayankhulenso, iye anapsa mtima.
Choncho Elihu mwana wa Barakeli wa fuko la Buzi anati:
Ndimaganiza kuti, ‘Ayambe ndi akuluakulu kuyankhula;
Koma mzimu wa Mulungu mwa munthu,
Si okalamba amene ali ndi nzeru,
“Nʼchifukwa chake ndikuti, ‘Mvereni;
Ndadikira nthawi yonseyi,
ineyo ndinakumvetseranidi.
Musanene kuti, ‘Ife tapeza nzeru;
Koma Yobu sanayankhule motsutsana ndi ine,
“Iwo asokonezeka ndipo alibe choti ayankhulenso;
Kodi ine ndidikire chifukwa iwo sakuyankhula tsopano,
Inenso ndiyankhulapo tsopano;
Pakuti ndili nawo mawu ambiri,
mʼkati mwanga ndili ngati botolo lodzaza ndi vinyo,
Ndiyenera kuyankhula kuti mtima utsike;
Sindidzakondera munthu wina aliyense,
pakuti ndikanakhala wa luso loyankhula moshashalika,
